# Firefly <h1> 
Open WIFI-enabled RGB lamp with temperature, humidity, suspended air particles and eCO2 sensors.

# List of components <h2> 

| Quantity | Component             | Image                                                        |
| -------- | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| 1        | ESP8266 Wemos D1 Mini | ![img](https://www.makerlab-electronics.com/my_uploads/2017/11/Wemos-D1-Mini-02.jpg) |
| 10       | WS2812B               | ![Untitled-1](http://www.zonamaker.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/Untitled-1-300x300.png) |
|12 		| Capacitor 0603 0.1uF |![Resultado de imagen de smd resistor 0603](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRU6sMF2_QkHeJFq0UvkKrfdBV-yTT_YZb7Qer5zJb1CylmQbux)|
|2			| Resistor 0603 |![Resultado de imagen de capacitor 0603](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQqDvTRpXamIbAZrpRCvoua7ImucBQHZI_vinkn3xYEF4FkrkK0FA)|
|1			| APDS-9960	Breakout Board|![Resultado de imagen de apds 9960 board](data:image/jpeg;base64,)|
|(Optional)* 1 	| DHT11 |![Resultado de imagen de dht11](https://www.compoindia.in/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/DHT11.png)|
|(Optional)* 1   | CCS811 + HDC1080 Breakout Board |![CJMCU8118-CCS811-HDC1080-CARBON-MONOXIDE-CO-VOCS-TEMPERATURE-AND-HUMIDITY-GAS](https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/THYAAOSwdtlZo9LL/s-l500.jpg)|



*Even though both components can be soldered to the same board or none of them, it is recommended to chose the CCS811 + HDC1080 module if you can pay it since it not only provides more information (TVOC 's and eCO2) but the temperature and humidity measurements are more accurate.



You can get all this components in different websites and I have found that Aliexpress is the cheapest one for most of these modules.
